ScrollIntoView Plugin

The jCarousel ScrollIntoView Plugin extends the jCarousel core by a scrollIntoView method.

Calling the method ensures that the passed target is fully visible inside the carousel.

scrollIntoView

Description

scrollIntoView(target [, animate [, callback]])

Scrolls the carousel so that the targeted item is fully visible. After scrolling, the item will be the first or last fully visible item.

Arguments

See the arguments of the scroll method.

Example

$('.jcarousel').jcarousel('scrollIntoView', 2, true, function(scrolled) {
    if (scrolled) {
        console.log('The carousel has been scrolled');
    } else {
        console.log('The carousel has not been scrolled');
    }
});
